hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Umar said :The Messenger of Allah(ﷺ) prescribed as zakat payable by slave and freeman, male and female, among the muslims on closing the fast of Ramadan one sa of dried dates or one sa’ of barley. (This tradition was read out byu ‘Abd Allah b. Maslamah to Malik)

chapter.ara-name: باب كَمْ يُؤَدَّى فِي صَدَقَةِ الْفِطْرِ
chapter.eng-name: How Much Sadaqah Should Be Given At The End Of Ramadan
